snippet.title: Eon Altar   Launch Trailer 2016
snippet.description:
A groundbreaking local co-op RPG for 1-4 players, available now on Steam for PC/MAC

Purchase Eon Altar on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/382050

In Eon Altar, we’ve captured the experience of a role-playing tabletop game and blended it into a video game. How did we pull that off? Well, the magic is in your own pocket.  

Press: http://eonaltar.com/resources/sheet.php?p=eon_altar
